Package com.mhealthatlas.mhealthatlasusers.controller

Class MHealthAtlasUserQueryController

java.lang.Object
com.mhealthatlas.mhealthatlasusers.controller.MHealthAtlasUserQueryController
@Controller
@RequestMapping("/mhealthatlas-users")
public class MHealthAtlasUserQueryController
extends java.lang.Object
MHealthAtlasUserQueryController is the class containing all API endpoints for quering user setting and stored queries.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    MHealthAtlasUserQueryController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<SettingDto>> getSettings()
    Queries the mHealthAtlas user service database for available settings.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<UserQueryDto>> getUserQueries​(java.util.UUID userId)
    Queries the mHealthAtlas user service database for saved user queries.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<UserSettingDto>> getUserSettings​(java.util.UUID userId)
    Queries the mHealthAtlas user service database for modified user settings.

  • Constructor Details

    • MHealthAtlasUserQueryController

      public MHealthAtlasUserQueryController()

  • Method Details

    • getSettings

      @GetMapping("/settings") @ResponseStatus(OK) @PreAuthorize("permitAll()") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<SettingDto>> getSettings()
      Queries the mHealthAtlas user service database for available settings.

      The method can be invoked with an HTTP GET request calling /mhealthatlas-users/settings

      All mHealthAtlas users are permitted to call this API endpoint.

      Returns:
      the found settings

    • getUserSettings

      @GetMapping("/users/{userId}/settings") @ResponseStatus(OK) @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_Admin\') || #userId.toString() == authentication.name") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<UserSettingDto>> getUserSettings​(@PathVariable java.util.UUID userId)
      Queries the mHealthAtlas user service database for modified user settings.

      The method can be invoked with an HTTP GET request calling /mhealthatlas-users/users/{userId}/settings

      All mHealthAtlas users are permitted to call this API endpoint for "themseelf".
      MHealthAtlas administrators can call this API endpoint for all users.

      Parameters:
      userId - the user id; not null; request path parameter
      Returns:
      the found modified user settings

    • getUserQueries

      @GetMapping("/users/{userId}/queries") @ResponseStatus(OK) @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_Admin\') || #userId.toString() == authentication.name") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<UserQueryDto>> getUserQueries​(@PathVariable java.util.UUID userId)
      Queries the mHealthAtlas user service database for saved user queries.

      The method can be invoked with an HTTP GET request calling /mhealthatlas-users/users/{userId}/queries

      All mHealthAtlas users are permitted to call this API endpoint for "themseelf".
      MHealthAtlas administrators can call this API endpoint for all users.

      Parameters:
      userId - the user id; not null; request path parameter
      Returns:
      the found saved queries of the user
